about_the_game:
Serious Fun Football is one of the few indie games where you can experience real physics and unique freedom of movement from a controlled character. Serious Fun Football is a game on the one hand created seriously, where realism is almost as high as in the world-famous football titles and on the other hand a casual game, where it's all about pure fun.

What does the gameplay look like? It's fast-paced 3vs3 play, which you probably know from your own experience while playing with your friends outdoors. There are no corners, no penalties, and no throw-ins. There's a focus on shooting, passing, and cooperation. Keep in mind that here there are not a lot of mechanisms that will assist you in controlling the footballer. You run, shoot, pass, aim and receive the ball using only your skill.

WIDE VARIETY OF CHOICES

Choose from the online game against other players or vs AI. If you prefer to play alone or have a party game with friends on your PC you can always do that in offline play. Career mode is for those who would like to create a footballer and make a true “goat” out of him. All games are 3vs3 but you can decide if you want to control just one player or the whole team. Friendly match - just click and play.

REAL FOOTBALL ATTRIBUTES

If someone has high attributes he will pass, shoot better, and run faster. Every single attribute matters. You can choose from many predefined footballers or create your own in career mode.

CUSTOMIZATION

As you play and win matches you’re going to earn in-game currency, which you can spend on a variety of things like unlocking new stadiums or customizing your player. There are so many possible options that it is hardly possible that someone will create exactly the same footballer as you!

MATCHES

In Serious Fun Football you are going to play matches 3vs3. There are no corners, no penalties, and no throw-ins. You decide if you control one player and focus mostly on ball anticipation, tackles, positioning, running, shooting, or controlling a full team of 3 where passing and tactics come into play.

In SFF you can choose from two difficulties - serious or fun. Each match can be played from 3 different camera angles - horizontal, vertical, and TPP.

GOALS

Serious Fun Football is a type of game that is easy to start but hard to master. Controlling your player/s to score a goal (especially vs a good team) you will need to learn how to aim with your passes and shooting. Using fences and precise movement should help a lot. To become a true professional SFF player you will have to take into account many factors like ball speed, stamina, strength, the distance of players, and more. By mastering the game you will feel how difficult it is to be a real professional footballer.

MAIN FEATURES:

⚽️ Online, offline and co-op mode

⚽️ Career mode

⚽️ Friendly matches

⚽️ Character or team control mode

⚽️ Online rankings

⚽️ Character customization editor

⚽️ In-game currency

⚽️ Easy to start hard to master

⚽️ Serious and Fun difficulty mode

⚽️ Different cameras – horizontal, vertical, TPP

Find people and friends to play with, talk, share, and become one of our big family

Support Early Access - developer’s few words and motivation:

Dear football/soccer fans,

Serious Fun Football is a truly indie project. It has been created for about 6 years. My dream was to create a football game that gives a lot of fun but also has a lot of realistic features that are quite unique among football games. This was a very ambitious idea so I had to quit my regular job and needed to employ some great people to finish the project. The game was funded 100% from private money.

I want you to know that behind the project there is so much more than just the desire to earn some 💲. It’s the adventure of my lifetime. It depends solely on you how it will continue.

Remember: every comment, feedback, and idea is important to us. So do you want to start this adventure with us?

name: Serious Fun Football

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955, Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change. SOME BUSINESS LAPTOPS WITH INTEGRATED GRAPHIC CARD WERE ABLE TO RUN THIS GAME ON A VERY LOW GRAPHICS SETTINGS, AS WE IMPLEMENTED SPECIAL FEATURE WHICH RESCALES THE RESOLUTION. FEEL FREE TO CHECK IF YOU ACHIEVE STABLE 60 FPS ON LOW END MACHINES WHILE FREE DEMO IS AVAILABLE. 60 FPS IS NEEDED FOR SMOOTH GAMEPLAY AND IS MANDATORY FOR ONLINE GAME. PLEASE BE ADVICED THAT THE GAME, IN LOW OR VERY LOW GRAPHICS SETTINGS, DOESN'T REPRESENT FULL PRODUCT VALUE.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX-6130 Six-Core, Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.

short_description: SERIOUS realism with advanced ball physics and freedom of player movement, FUN casual dynamic gameplay, online or in single-player. This is Serious Fun Football. It's play ball time!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
